pages.title: Helical Contraptions I
pages.text: $(o)''...So, with the possession of right resources at your hand, you had made a machine of high precision, called the Quantiscope. Truly, an astonishing piece of technology, allowing you to create important components to maintain your Timeship. Yet, you discover more of new pages, for an advanced version of said machinery...''$()

$(o)''Your expression goes to awe, as you learn it's capabilities, letting you create wonderful technology, once nothing more but fiction. How you utilize this information, depends only on you...''$()
